website_summaries.verdict: The Sony RDP-XF100iP is a versatile, powerful iPod/iPhone speaker for around the home that surprises with its deep low-end sound.
pros: The Sony RDP-XF100iP delivers impressively powerful sound given its portable size
comes with a useful remote control and FM radio
cons: In spite of its portability, the hefty, minimal design doesn't lend itself to active outdoor use
The concave buttons on the top are difficult to distinguish

customer_reviews.title: Source switching problem
customer_reviews.text: This stereo system, discontinued by the manufacturer, started within a week switching repeatedly to radio source for no reason, regardless of whether it was connected to a iPod, iPhone, iPodTouch or iPad of various generations. We previously had the same unit, with the same devices, that lasted well over a year before exhibiting the same issue. We purchased it again, hoping it would not exhibit the same problem, even though multiple reviews reported the switching to radio source issue. We will not purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great overall design and sound
customer_reviews.text: The first Sony docking station I ordered from Amazon was defective. Music would play for a little while and then inexplicably shut off after emitting a loud sound. This occurred with the FM and the iPhone option. I spoke with Sony the next day and they said to send it back. Amazon provided exceptional customer service in doing the exchange. The second unit has been functioning very well for the past 3 weeks. Great sound quality especially with the iPhone and while they say you need to use the adapter (included) and thus take the cover off your iPhone, it is not necessary. Amazon by far offered the best deal on this unit at least when I was looking.
customer_reviews.author: R. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't recharge after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after hearing a friend's. The sound is amazing from something so relatively small! That's the good news. The bad news: The rechargeable battery only lasted for about 6 months before it stopped accepting a charge. Now, the only way to use the speakers is plugged in. Sort of defeats the purpose of a "rechargeable speaker system". I called Sony to seek support and they told me that the battery was not covered under warranty and a replacement battery is over $100. No thanks. Needless to say, I'll be looking for a new rechargeable speaker system. I'm sure it won't be another Sony though!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Quality
customer_reviews.text: This device is absolutely awesome!!! the sound quality is very crisp. I love the bass it produces and the loudness; as you increase the volume of this device, you can still hear the crisp and beautiful sound. Connect this device with Airport Express and now you can stream music from your PC directly into this device WIRELESSLY!!! all with QUALITY along with PORTABILITY. No product is perfect so here are some little nuissances. If you are using the battery, the bass is not as powerfuly as when connected, the little remote control does not have a MUTE button, your finger prints can get all over it. I still recommend this great product due to quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, but dock is too flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the unit and the sound is good, but the fold-in dock doesn't lock firmly into place and there's nothing behind it to hold the iPod steady when it's docked. This leaves the iPod "flopping" around whenever you touch it. I also had concerns about the "error" that several reviewers reported experiencing. I decided to return it and purchase a lower model Sony unit (RDP-XF30IP) for less than half the price. It looks virtually identical but has a fixed dock with a support behind it that keeps it firmly in place but doesn't have a radio. I didn't compare the sound side-by-side, but the lesser model sounded about the same to me.
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product. Very good sound, fm radio, aux audio and ipod cabable, also a remote controller
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is indeed upward of seven hours (I tested it right away after the initial charge). The tone of the music is well balanced (bass/treble). The remote control, while difficult to see in dim light, is easy to use. I have this plugged in to my living room, and it comes with me whenever! Great price for a great product. Only drawback: it only has an Input feature, no Output. So I can't hook it up to my master speakers in the room. No biggie, since the sound is great. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Renee NY

customer_reviews.title: Portable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad unit for the price. I wanted something to play my first generation iPod and this gets the job done. I have some larger bookshelf speakers for about twice the price that I love but that require me to burn a CD to use them, which is not so convenient, and of course not portable. The Sony is handily portable and compact, which I like. At louder volumes, the mid-range and bass get a little mushy. For best results, put the unit in a corner. It will fill up the room nicely and can be heard over small gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Wafflemaker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, and battery life is good
customer_reviews.text: it's a great unit with really good sound, the bass is also very good. My husband had several others that we had to return, because the sound was not up to his expectations. The only thing that would be better is if you could use the remote to advance when the AUX port is being used
customer_reviews.author: Chris E Stinski

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I selected this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves to listen to talk shows and music on his iPhone, mainly because he can easily carry it around the house with him...even onto the back deck. But, in my opinion, the sound from an IPhone just isn't that great. This speaker filled everything I was looking for. When running sound from an iPhone through this speaker, the sound is much improved and it is very portable, so he'll be able to take it with him anywhere in the house..
customer_reviews.author: Linda Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Sony iPod docking station
customer_reviews.text: This is my first iPod and I selected the Sony dock after reading reviews of this and other brands in Amazon. I am fully satisfied with the Sony docking station. Sound quality is outstanding, it is compact and attractive and the depth of the sound and volume carries beautifully. I am truly enjoying it, and also find the tuner feature to be a real plus. I would highly recommend this piece of equipment to anyone seeking a beautiful sound system at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sounding Portable Sound System
customer_reviews.text: Sounds very good and great to be able to run portable on the internal batteries. However I had a bad speaker show up after about six months. Not due to playing too loud as I play soft back ground music while working. Speaker was just defective. Have never repaired and use as is.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product - hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product - hard to find. Thoroughly enjoy the features with the big sound. Works perfectly around our pool.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product which fills my living room with wonderful music
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: BOSE VS SONY
customer_reviews.text: I received the Bose system as a birthday gift in January and I loved it yet i wanted a portable docking station to travel with SO... I recently purchased this Sony docking station and i can now truly see a difference! Now, dont get me wrong the Bose is the greatest by far, BUT Sony is stunning as well..it's have a radio and I love the portability of this device. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: qadeera

customer_reviews.title: nice piece
customer_reviews.text: I think this is quite suitable. It's pretty loud and has good sound quality. It's very conveinient with the i-phone, no adapter needed. I use it more for the FM radio. The presets with the remote work well good,but the hand control for the presets seem to just not work the way I think they were intended, maybe it's just me. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce X

customer_reviews.title: poor product description  returned it
customer_reviews.text: vendor did accept return but hassle factor. I should not have purchased as poor product description...who would remove your Iphone case everytime you wanted to play music or dock to charge???? Many adaptors which is hassle and did not have sonys new flexible pin docker that flexes slightly to avoid damage to dock or phone,
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pines

customer_reviews.title: Boom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fabulous. The range is perfect even for for the patio & back yard. It pushed high quality sounds up to until level 25, which is more than enough for the casual user. The radio and digital display's are a major bonus with this docking station. So it seems folks like to compare it to Bose and I'll join in as well. For the money it's better than Bose. Yes, no kidding; it's really that good.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C

customer_reviews.title: Who needs Bose?
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something portable for outside. This thing is great. Use it on my deck, take it over to my neighbors and I keep in it in the kitchen. Also great for yard work. Battery life is good and FM reception comes in crystal clear. Sound is excellent for the price. No regrets whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: XavierFan

customer_reviews.title: The dock I'd been looking for
customer_reviews.text: This dock has great sound for it's size. It looks great too. I have recommended it to friends. The aux input cord that came with it is a bit short and the docking tray rattles when folded into the speaker system. I don't own an Ipod so I don't need it open. I don't forget that I'm listening to a miniature speaker system (even though it's very good). It's very good for what it is. It can't, however, replace my home h-fi system.
customer_reviews.author: Arugula

customer_reviews.title: Worked good with old iPod
customer_reviews.text: This worked great with old iPods but was really disappointed that iPhones were not capable of playing on it. If u use aux cable it will work but it's annoying and upgraded to the iPhone shortly after buying it. Has great sound and is was great with iPod.
customer_reviews.author: sdrizzle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This iDock is amazing! Great sound, like a much bigger system. It's fully portable, has a great battery life. We take it to our neighborhood pool all the time. Love that I can charge my phone at the same time. My mother liked mine so much, she ordered one for herself!
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Best IPOD docking station
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think an IPOD docking station could be this good. Unlike Bose this has a FM radio with very good reception when the Antenna is extended. Sound quality is excellent. I am glad I got a Sony! The price is high but others in this area are about the same price and they have no radio etc or other functionality this has.
customer_reviews.author: SamTheMan

customer_reviews.title: As good as Bose
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sony iPod docking station -- i've been using it for over 2 years now, and it has performed beautifully. I have it in my living room, and I can hear the music throughout the whole house, yet doesn't distort the sound at all. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: KitKatGenie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I did some research online regarding what would be some of the better iPod docking stations and the Sony came up as being a front runner. I made the order through Amazon and have been very satisfied. As always Amazon makes it easy to search for the items and then make the purchase. The item arrived in a timely manner and I have been very happy with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: s9

customer_reviews.title: quality and value.  winner buy.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price and quality. I'm not disappointed at all. Good bass and roomy audio. The remote and fm radio is a step up from other systems. Add a BT adapter to this and you're all set.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Quality and Value

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have teenagers who love there music. I looked at several different options for us to play our playlist and I'm sooo glad I went with this versus spending a lot of money on a sound system. It goes where we go...indoors or outdoors. We love to have it on the back porch while entertaining. Sound quality is amazing and battery life is sufficient for us. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steff

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, mediocre reception
customer_reviews.text: This Sony functions very well as a docking station as it has very good sound. But beware, it's not small (wide rather than deep) and there is NO provision for an external FM antenna, so the reception in the suburbs is only fair. With antenna input, I'd give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: W. Gaboda

customer_reviews.title: SONY RDPXF100IP IPOD/IPHONE 3G PORTABLE SPEAKER DOCK WITH FM TUNER - YRDPXF100IP
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 refurbish units 7 months ago. Been working great, no issues, my kids been happy. Anyone who hears the output on this units has been very amaze. For the price at 114.00 each, how can you go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Fastone01

customer_reviews.title: quit working after 8 months.
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice while it worked. I've only had this for 8 months. It charged only once and only worked when plugged in. I never really used it with my ipod until I got my new Itouch a couple of months ago. So in reality it only worked for a few months. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sound
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the easy portability of this unit. I don't use it with an ipod; but my mp3 works fine with it. The lithium battery has a long playing life and recharges quickly when plugged in to an ac circuit. We were without power for 4 days, and this unit was a lifesaver. My only complaint is the size and bulkiness of the plug in cord and "adapter".
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Spade

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Very Good sound. Deep bass and nice volume range for a night stand sized audio system. The fm radio is lack luster but the docking sound is fabulous which more than makes up for the lower fm quality. Anyway, we love it and definitely recommend it to those of you who use your iphone more for listening pleasure than you do a major sterio or fm dial.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. Sony is a good name brand and once again I was not let down! It has very good sound quality and it can be turned up load enough to hear throughout the whole house! I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best sound Dock Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow i got it today in the mail was super easy to hook up got my ipod and started playing it , the sound is amazing so small and perfect yet so loud and clear and the bass Rocks thank you so much.My father was here in the house and he loved it so much we are gonna get another one before he leaves on vacation ! Great !!!!
customer_reviews.author: john orbegozo

customer_reviews.title: good sound high quality
customer_reviews.text: Battery only holds a charge for 3-4 hours. Thought it would be louder. Overall good sound, light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Walk

customer_reviews.title: Great portable product with reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a BD gift for my teenage daughter. I decided to give Sony RDP-XF 100IP a try after reviewed a lot of similar products online and tried them out in the stores. At the end she was very happy for the quality of the sound, the portability, and the ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Moo Moo

customer_reviews.title: Had to return due to defect
customer_reviews.text: Overall quality I'm sure was ok, but the one I received was either defective or might have been a design flaw: the remote control functioned fine except for 1 fatal flaw....it would not turn on the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Condado Beach

customer_reviews.title: still going strong after years of use - just the ...
customer_reviews.text: still going strong after years of use - just the battery doesn't last as long on charge anymore - but wow!
customer_reviews.author: tall23chick

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but I would avoid
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, charges iphone, etc but prone to erratic operation. I've owned two of these and both had to be sent back to Sony for repair. I would avoid this product like the plague. It's a shame too because the sound quality is pretty damn good.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Love my Sony Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: Struggled long and hard between the Bose and the Sony. Went with the Sony because of the price and the added benefit of the radio. It was easy to set up and sounded great immediately. A great value for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: We needed something in the way of an iPod docking station & speakers. A thorough search of Amazon's site revealed that this product exuded quality and pristine sound. It more than exceeds or expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Gary in Delray Florida

customer_reviews.title: Surprising Bass for the Size
customer_reviews.text: CNET was right-on with their review. I'm very happy with the CLEAR & DEEP LOW-END SOUND. The remote makes the iPod easier to navigate than even the iPod menu! Portable with handle for room to room, but not light enough to toss in a back-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Wohali

customer_reviews.title: Super satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with this unit. It has great sound. I will not work for the iPhone 5 Only for the older generation iphone/ipod connector. Recharging seems to take a very long time, like overnite.
customer_reviews.author: T Miller

customer_reviews.title: best that $$ can buy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a portable sound system for my ipod with an eye on the bose system which cost much much more when i came upon this sony. Needless to say i am totally satisfied with the experience! This baby can fill a small room to a nice size livingroom with quality sound. Very user friendly and did i say it's portable?...yup!...now it goes everywhere i do...the beach, park and with just getting together with some friends. The remote control is convienient for changing formats. I'd recommend this over any or most other comparable ipod docking systems...it meets my needs and more.
customer_reviews.author: kev

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this unit. It looks good, has a quality sound with good bass. I tested it using my ipod at above mid range volume. It played for 7 hours without recharge. I am totally satisified with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank In Cincinnati

customer_reviews.title: Sound Docks
customer_reviews.text: I have been shopping for a portable dock for quite sometime, I've listen to a few name brand etc; price and sound was my main objective. It's been my experience that Sony make excellent products, I checked out the reveiws on this product the RDP-XF100IP, the price was great, and also the features, next I went shopping on the Amazon network and found a refurbished one for about half the price of a new one, this portable dock is awsome, and certainly has my approval.
customer_reviews.author: Music Man

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Stereo!
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful compact stereo arrived in a very timely manner and has performed perfectly. It sounds great, plays a long time on the rechargeable battery and has a built in radio in addition to the i-pod dock. It is everything I was looking for in a portable player.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Compared many similar products and chose this one over Bose due to the price difference (Bose was twice as expensive). Am satisfied with appearance, remote, portability, and overall sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hermione

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice!
customer_reviews.text: You generally can't go wrong with Sony products and this iPod Docking Station is no exception. It's easy to navigate and has terrific sound quality and features. A great product at a reasonable price. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds fantastic for such a small unit. Battery life could be better but considering how good this sounds I'm willing to look the other way on this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Crisper highs, fuller lows, than the Doze.
customer_reviews.text: This is now an outdated model. So on top of its impressive sound quality, I bought it at a clearance price. That made it even more satisfying, especially when I compared it to the price and sound of the favored competition. If there is a disappointment, it could be the FM tuner performance. Though I did use it in an area quite distant from a city.
customer_reviews.author: Northerner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This Sony has amazing sound, 80-90% of sound of the Bose sound dock at about 1/2 the price in Side by side comparison at local big box store. Plenty of Bass and lovely highs and midrange as well. Primarily used for background music in my Massage studio, but Surprisingly Good sound when kicking it up after hours as well. Have not utilized battery mode. Remote works well for me. Only slight criticism is the equalizer has only an assortment of presets. Would DEFINITELY purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Henke

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: It has a very good sound and has many options. I compared the performance of Sony Docking vs. Bose Soundock, and I can say that the difference is not that much. Of course, the bass of the Bose is more clear and powerfull, but the Sony has a very good performance too, and the sony is chepear. It worths it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound. Good value
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have bought for a different location. Very good sound. Good value. Similar models were much more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: dr victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item!! After my original Sony RDPXF100IP iPhone/iPod Portable Sound Dock was stolen from my home, I looked everywhere to replace this item. Others that I had looked at didn't have the radio component, which was one of the features that I loved the most. The sound is also great. Was so happy to have found one on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dock
customer_reviews.text: I had a logitech dock which was OK. I went to best buy, and this sony dock was equal to better than the bose sound dock. This is a better price with a long lasting battery - minimal drain after three hours - along with a built in FM tuner. I am not a huge fan of the power source as there is a bulky box it goes through, and it would be nice to have a padded carrying case, but otherwise this is a great system for the money. Plenty loud for the garage or back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Twoeyes

customer_reviews.title: Daily use
customer_reviews.text: We use this Sony almost daily. sound is very very nice and I love the fact its mobile to use by the pool. I bought another one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: DEN

customer_reviews.title: Music Clear as A Bell
customer_reviews.text: Great iPod portable speaker docking station. The sound is crystal clear. You may sometimes have problems with the docking, otherwise it is a good choice for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Grandma

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money...display stopped working and is now unusable
customer_reviews.text: I barely used this and now the display no longer works, which means it's unusable. Did NOT get my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like this product, the sound is very impressive for the size and its nice its portable without the wall charger. it says when not plugged in you may notice a decrease in output but its wasnt much sounded great. Easy touch contols and digital, Comes with remote also. The only downfall is the front dock for the ipod, not much support may break easily if mishandeled.
customer_reviews.author: laknwrk

customer_reviews.title: Super sounding!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. For once all of the hype about a product turned out not to be hyperbole. This has a terrific sound. No ifs ands or buts about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from this small unit - easily rivals my Bose
customer_reviews.text: This was a great table top unit w/FM, IPOD etc. Sound quality was very good and it was much less expensive than my Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Mullan

customer_reviews.title: Sony IPOD dock.....good value!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one to replace my older Bose Ipod dock that was no longer compatible due to software upgrades. Very good sound quality and reasonably comparable to the Bose. I would recommend as a very good value and this one is portable as well.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Koloff

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great sound coming from my iphone though these great speakers so happy I bought 2 more for a total of 3 of these great docking stations
customer_reviews.author: B. Ban

customer_reviews.title: Sony  Player
customer_reviews.text: It has worked well and gets good reception, Battery run time is a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Carl G. Hokanson

customer_reviews.title: sony speaker
customer_reviews.text: good sound , rechareable which makes it very portable. Would be a big improvememnt if it were bluetooth as some other Sony moderls are.
customer_reviews.author: mesdmd

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: This unit has good sound quality and portability for my use teaching dance classes in a variety of indoor settings.
customer_reviews.author: Maxxxster

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: ** sounds great *** looks great *** looks very much like my Bose. I love my Bose but this is great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: happydaze11

customer_reviews.title: Sony RDP-XF100IP Portable iPod Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: Comes with several iPod adapters but fit is very loose and easily disconnected. Buttons give very little tactile feedback. Tone Quality is good and suitable for moderate sized rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Lane

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Years later and it still works great. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Caugh

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: this replaces an identical unit which was about 6 years old. Enjoyed the first unit, so looked for and purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: crazycam

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This product is better than described. The sound quality is excellent even at higher volume levels. This does compare to a bose but is cheaper in price only. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: rating
customer_reviews.text: very well priced and a nice gift - would order from Amazon again for this type of product for a gift or myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Exellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom! She loves this Sony portable ipod docking station easy to use ! Exellente product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Geat sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I spoke with some friends who had docking stations and after listining to each of theirs I decided on the Sony. It blew away the sound quality of the Bose. I did however have to loose the ability to use bluetooth and settle for the speaker wire system. Its really all about the sound, isn't it??
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Musick

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the sound is very, very good for the size. Even FM radio sounds decent. We have Pandora Radio playing almost all the time in the house via iPod touch and can easily, wirelessly take it out on the back deck for commercial free music there too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great. Good sound and volume. Best bang for the buck I found after researching online. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Sony Ipod docking station
customer_reviews.text: Great sound. Radio reception is better than any other radio I have owned, Love that it is portable. I really shopped for an Ipod and radio combp with good speakers and I believe I got a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a docking station for the ipod classic. Just wish it had D-cell batteries instead of the recharging. Sound is great, battery life not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A. McGinnity

customer_reviews.title: Jack
customer_reviews.text: This was a factory refurbished model. It was pacted factory fresh with full warranty, and performs as advertised. I believe I purchased a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack W. Crocker

customer_reviews.title: great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Easy to set up and use right out of the box. Has an adapter for my old 1st generation Shuffle, too.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Music lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last year and gave it to my girlfriend. I bought one for myself this year. Enough said.As good if not better than Bose for almost half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Francis Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Totally stoked. Good bass, excellent highs and lows. Didn't want to spend twice as much for what I think is the same, if not better, sound quality as Bo$e. My only cavil (it means unnecessary fault) is the poor range of the remote. Other than that I'm totally happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kaupo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality on this is docking station is great! Love the size too, very compact! You can pack it up and take it anywhere easiiy! I would recomemend it in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Fab Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sony portable iPod docking station. I have used it almost daily for a month and it has great sound. I use it in a large pool area and it has plenty of volume for such a huge room. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Keno

customer_reviews.title: Rock Box
customer_reviews.text: For everything this thing does for the price you can't go wrong, Sony really nailed nailed it.Portable; Rechargable, Hi Fidelity, Loud, I love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Sicard

customer_reviews.title: Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent product choice. The sound quality is near perfect. the portability makes it easy to move around and the weight makes it easy for my wife to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Burl Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchases this for my Mom for Christmas. She absolutely loves it! It's super easy to use and it has great sound. My mom has a small townhouse, we put the speaker dock downstairs and we can easily hear it in most rooms of the house. It was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: LAURA WOOD

customer_reviews.title: We love this unit
customer_reviews.text: This thing has great sound, is pretty portable, and just works. One thing I don't like is the super high polished trim on the top. For use outdoors, it shows dust easily and scratched in a couple spots when cleaning. But that isn't enough to take away from the product.
customer_reviews.author: jhd4759

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Great Docking Station
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy.... Bought the refurbished model and it came sealed by Sony with all wires & remotes sealed by the factory. Awesome buy saved about 65% from buying New. Great Docking Station...
customer_reviews.author: Andres Intriago

customer_reviews.title: We are so pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We recently used this Sony dock, with an Ipod, at a crafts event. I think I could have sold a dozen of them. No one could believe the sound coming out of this dock.. Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: SueA

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I love this Sony iPod docking station. Looks cool, sounds great, easy to use, very portable, great value for money. The only thing is I wish it came with an adapter for the iPhone 4.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Caffrey

customer_reviews.title: everything I was looking for in quality!
customer_reviews.text: The only suggestion I would have is for it to have a handle, so you can transport it more easily. Otherwise, it is everything I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Cirks

customer_reviews.title: good recommendable product
customer_reviews.text: i've been looking for a good ipod dock. This met all my expectations. I like the sound and how it fills my living rm.
customer_reviews.author: julietpo

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The volume was broken and didn't adjust correctly. It appears to be a good product but when adjusting the volume it went in jumps with crackling between steps.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy user

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!1 the shipping was crazy fast...great product..great sound worth every penny. Perfect inside and out...love the portability. so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: great packaging, good looking product. but it simply did not work. Okay I will be fair. it played for a few minutes then it made a loud buzzing noise and tuned off.reading error aferwards it never seemed to work properly. Way to make an ipod player Sony!
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use with iPhone alarm
customer_reviews.text: The system is cute and sounds good but it powers down after 20 min if the phone is not actively playing music. I planned to use this as a nice set of speakers to wake up to my phone alarm and it is completely useless for that purpose as it powers itself off. I attempted to use the Sony iPhone software, which is equally useless, and also called support who confirmed that there is no way to do this. Speakers are nice but as a docking station this silly feature sort of ruins it. Dan
customer_reviews.author: getdano

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, when it works!
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been nothing but problems. If it is plugged in it will behave like a ghost is randomly selecting buttons. It switches modes, stations, powers off... Works great unplugged off of the charge, but the batteries don't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Dioxua

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Own Internal Battery Dock for variety of Ipod and Iphone. Works on Ipod Nano 3G with original dock adapter Strong Speakers, great fidelity Radio and Audio - IN Cons: Not audio out, i'd like to attach this to my sony home theater AC/DC Adapter required to charge batteries (similar to the laptops)
customer_reviews.author: BADBOY

product_meta.title: Sony RDPXF100IP 30-Pin iPhone/iPod Portable Speaker Dock (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingGo-anywhere sound quality, only by Sony. Hear the difference -- in any room, indoors or out -- with the Sony RDP-XF100iP portable dock for iPod and iPhone 1. The rechargeable battery provides up to seven hours of listening, and when plugged into a power source the dock charges your iPod or iPhone .
feature_bullets: Retractable flip-down dock for iPod/iPhone charging
